verses.name: Psalms 68:24
verses.text: They have seen thy goings, O God; even the goings of my God, my King, in the sanctuary.

verses.name: Psalms 68:25
verses.text: The singers went before, the players on instruments followed after; among them were the damsels playing with timbrels.

verses.name: Psalms 68:26
verses.text: Bless ye God in the congregations, even the Lord, from the fountain of Israel.

verses.name: Psalms 68:27
verses.text: There is little Benjamin with their ruler, the princes of Judah and their council, the princes of Zebulun, and the princes of Naphtali.

verses.name: Psalms 68:28
verses.text: Thy God hath commanded thy strength: strengthen, O God, that which thou hast wrought for us.
